Package me.fonts.graphics

Interface IScreen

public interface IScreen
An interface for a rasterization screen. The class that extends this will need to properly implement the SpriteBase into their pixels array; otherwise, the fonts will not appear properly.
Author:
Joshua Diemer

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    clear(int color)
    An abstract method to clear all of the pixels of the array.
    void
    render(SpriteBase sprite, int x, int y, int... opaqueColors)
    An abstract method to render a SpriteBase to the pixels array that you have set up.

  • Method Details

    • clear

      void clear(int color)
      An abstract method to clear all of the pixels of the array.
      Parameters:
      color - The color to clear the pixels of the array to.

    • render

      void render(SpriteBase sprite, int x, int y, int... opaqueColors)
      An abstract method to render a SpriteBase to the pixels array that you have set up.
      Parameters:
      sprite - The sprite to render to the pixels array.
      x - The x position on the pixels array to render to.
      y - The y position on the pixels array to render to.
      opaqueColors - Which colors, if any, to avoid rendering (usually 0xFFFF00FF).
